dasisama bhariyakopa naththi, thama swamiya wisin dandak gena ‘thi nasannemi’yi tharjanaya karana kalhida nokipunawu ma, dwesha nowu sith aththi, swamiyage warada iwasada, yam purushayekuta mebandu swabhawa athi bharyawak wanne da aya thama swami purushayata dasiyaka men salakana bharyawaki.me lokayehi bharyawan athara yam bharyawak wadhaka bharyawak, chora bharyawak ha swami bharyawak lesa thama swamiyata katayuthu karanne da owunge dusshila bawa ha ayahapath charyawan nisa maranin pasu dugathiyata yanne ya.me lokayehi yam bharyawak mathru bharyawak, bhagini bharyawak, sakhi bharyawak ha dasi bharyawak lesa thama swamiyata katayuthu karanne da silwath bawa ha yahapath charyawan nisa ebandu aya maranin pasu sugathiyata yanne ya.
